DataElement.preferredName: Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Matched Related Donor Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Yes/No response that indicates the patient meets the eligibility requirement for participation in a clinical trial with regard to receiving a matched related donor stem cell transplant.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation Matched Related Donor Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A clinical treatment in which hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another._A donor who is related to the transplant recipient, and who is a human leukocyte antigen (HLA) tissue type match._Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A clinical treatment in which HSC capable of reconstituting the immune system and blood production (hematopoiesis) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another. The donor and recipient may or may not be related. 2005

Concepts.definition: A clinical treatment in which hematopoietic stem cells (HSCs) are transferred from one genetically dissimilar individual to another.

Property.preferredDefinition: A donor who is related to the transplant recipient, and who is a human leukocyte antigen (HLA) tissue type match.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: A donor who is related to the transplant recipient, and who is a human leukocyte antigen (HLA) tissue type match.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated for study ACCL1633 Eligibility CRF. 12/20/17 AH.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient plan on receiving stem cells from a matched (8/8) related donor?
